Description:
EXECUTIVE LIVING AT ITS FINEST, CLOSE TO CENTRAL CLAYTON
Boasting stunning design, unrivaled quality and features, this executive style townhouse is also located within an easy walk of central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station. With low maintenance living on many occupiers and investors shopping list, this meets the brief perfectly with features including a living/dining room incorporating the stone and stainless equipped kitchen and there's also another living area upstairs or open study area. There are 2 robed bedrooms upstairs, a bathroom tiled in porcelain from floor to ceiling and a total of 3 toilets. There's a range of extras that add to its appeal including split system heater/air conditioner, LED lighting and double glazed windows while outside you find a remote garage with internal access and private landscaped courtyard.
Insights: 9 other 2 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Location, Location, Location!
Don't miss out on this absolute gem situated in a prime location only 600m to Clayton Shopping Centre, 900m to Clayton train station and only minutes' drive to the world renowned Monash Medical Centre and Monash University. For the shopping enthusiasts, Chadstone Shopping Centre, IKEA, Costco and Moorabbin DFO are just a short drive away. And the Restaurant goers have an endless supply of options down the main street of Clayton.
This would be a perfect place to call home, or for the astute investor to add value to the existing property and reap the rewards for years to come. We also don't want to overlook the enormous potential to develop a large luxury home or build 2 brand new dwellings on this prized locale (STCA).
Offers:
- 2 Bedrooms
- 1 bath
- 1 car garage
- Land size approx. 576m2
Insights: 32 Knight Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Corner Block Home Presents Great Potential!
Innovative renovators or developers can look no further with this much loved 3 bedroom residence on a generous corner block and brimming with huge potential!
A model of spacious living and embracing a low-maintenance sensibility, this treasured home delivers a relaxed lounge with a gas fireplace, adjoined meals zone and open kitchen featuring a dual sink and quality appliances (incl. a gas cooktop), 3 well-sized bedrooms (1 with BIR), neat bathroom with separate bath and shower, separate toilet, and laundry.
A perfect prospect to remodel or extend into a trendy family home, rebuild into a townhouse block investment (STCA), or lease out as it is, this affordable abode also features massive gardens, storage shed, and a single garage with ample storage space and dual driveway access.
Conveniently located only minutes to Westall Primary School, St Peter's School, Westall Secondary College, Clayton and Westall train stations, Clarinda shops & Clayton Road shops, Keeley Park, and several golf clubs.
Insights: 474 Haughton Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A STREET FRONT 3 BEDROOM HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION
The street front of just two, this classic home has been kept in beautiful condition throughout its life with some updates making it instantly appealing and comfortable with potential for further improvements.
Fronted by a picket fence and a classic rendered façade, the home is light filled and features polished hardwood floors throughout, an L-shaped lounge/dining room and a pristine kitchen with stainless steel wall oven, cook top and dishwasher.
There are three bedrooms including two with built in wardrobes plus a neat family bathroom, two toilets and the added comforts of a gas heater and split system air conditioner.
Outside, the fenced front garden makes a great kids play area and there's also a rear set garage with sectioned storage area and a compact courtyard.
And with buses, Keeley Park and central Clayton's shops and train station just minutes away, a great location just seals the deal.
Insights: 1/16 Mallawa Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 13 other 3 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
LARGE ALLOTMENT 778 sm approx.
This large parcel of land has potential for redevelopment into townhouses, dual occupancy or build your dream home (scta),. The existing large home with many original features offers entrance hall, 3 large bedrooms, separate lounge, separate rumpus room, central bathroom, and kitchen with meals area, laundry, huge garage and double carport. This is an outstanding opportunity to secure a property within walking distance to the Clayton Shopping Centre, the Clayton Community Centre and swimming pool, Namatjira Park and St Andrew's Primary. Land Dimensions 16.15m x 48.21m

Description:
PREMIUM EXECUTIVE LIVING IN ULTRA CONVENIENT LOCALE
Cleverly designed to maximize light and space with large windows, high ceilings and sparkling flooring that reflects the suns natural glow, this executive style townhouse delivers all the comforts required for easy lifestyle living. Positioned for privacy at the rear, the home opens to reveal a magnificent open plan kitchen, dining and living zone, resting beneath towering 2.7m high ceilings and highlighted by stone waterfall benches, modern appliances, glass splashbacks, soft close drawers plus a convenient island breakfast bench. Glass sliding doors create a seamless indoor-outdoor connection flowing onto a spacious, covered alfresco entertaining zone. The master bedroom is desirably situated on the entry level and accompanied by a full ensuite with bath, walk-in-robe and direct rear courtyard access. While a discrete powder room and laundry provide additional downstairs convenience. Leading upstairs, two further bedrooms benefit from built-in-robes and are complemented by a delightful study nook and bathroom with toilet, all bedrooms with timber flooring. Enhanced by all the extras you'd expect from a quality residence, including ducted heating, refrigerated air conditioning, alarm, video intercom, double glazing plus a single garage with internal access and second driveway parking space and water tank. Situated in a location that resonates with upmost convenience, within walking distance to both Westall and Clayton Train Stations, Clayton Shopping Village, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Aquatics Centre, Westall Primary and Secondary schools and parkland, whilst close to Monash Uni and freeway access. Photo ID required at all open for inspections.
Insights: 1/30A Oakes Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Owner Says Sell! Under Contract
This very well presented brick veneer unit with only 4 on the block has everything to offer. Neat and tidy, it has everything you want and needs minimum fuss.
Comprising: 2 bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, good size living area opening to modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and gas cooktop, gas heating, single carport and big backyard for entertainment.
Within a short walking distance to Westall Train Station, Primary and Secondary School, local shops and only a few minutes' drive to Monash University and Monash Hospital.
Don't miss out! For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357.

Description:
Distinguished Family Residence
Lovingly cared for family home first time offered for sale in 30 years is well presented on a generous block just minutes away from Clayton, Clarinda and Westall shops, Westall Primary School, Clayton railway station, bus routes and easy access to some of Melbourne's major arterials & walking distance to Clayton South Primary School. Spacious family home offers entrance hall, 4 bedrooms or 3 plus study or second living room, central bathroom, open plan kitchen, living & dining. Alfresco at the rear of the property provides a great area for entertaining family and friends. Features include ducted heating, air conditioning, floor boards and double garage and storage shed.
Usman Maan : 0402 688 866

Description:
Land, Location & Limitless Possibilities
Beautifully maintained and comfortably accommodating, this 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom weatherboard home offers immediate appeal with exciting future options. Impeccable presentation and timeless neutral tones enhance a spacious lounge, immaculate kitchen/meals area, family room, split system heating/AC, studio and tandem carport. To the rear, a private deck adds entertaining allure, whilst impressive land dimensions (690m2 approx) provide a rare opportunity to build a second dwelling whilst retaining the existing, start afresh with multiple units or luxury new home (STCA). Idyllically located moments to Westall and Clayton stations, local shops, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
It's yours if the price is right!!
Tucked away in a quiet street, yet with convenient access to surrounding facilities is this 2 bedroom unit that has all a family needs!
Comprises; open entrance, spacious lounge, modern kitchen (with dishwasher) and adjoining meals area, separate laundry opens onto a private courtyard with low maintenance garden. Two good size bedrooms with large family bathroom, undercover carport and ample space for visitors parking.
Great for first home owner, investor or just add to your property portfolio.
Additional features; floating floor boards, evaporative cooling and wall heating unit.

Description:
Build your dream home, move in, invest or subdivide (STCA)
Look for the hidden treasure on Bond Street, no not 007!
The original family home consists of 3 bedrooms plus study, large formal lounge with parquetry flooring, central bathroom with spa bath plus separate laundry and toilet. The home sits on a great block of land measuring 614 square metres approximately in a leafy street where there are some lovely original homes and some huge brand new ones being built. Location is excellent near to Namatjira Park, Schools, Church, strip shopping centre and Cafes, Medical Centres, Coles, Community Centre and Indoor pool.
Monash Hospital is a short 5 minute drive and Monash University only 10 minutes away. The first time this home has been on the market for over 20 years.
Inspection a must.
For more details contact Sharline Tsung 0416 086 818

Description:
Corner Block Great Home and So Many Possibilities!!!!
(All my personal commission will be donated to Cambodian Children's Fund CCF)
Are you looking for that next home or your first home, an investor looking for great rental yield or great potential for further capital growth or are you a builder looking for that next profitable opportunity??? Well whoever you are, whatever your plans....this property IS IT.
Located in Clayton South's hottest pocket, offering convenience, family friendly environment, beautiful street scape and an enviable lifestyle that would be hard to find for a suburb under $1,000,000.
About the Home
3 bedrooms (BIR's)
Renovated modern bathroom
Polished floorboards
Ducted Heating
Secured Roller Shutters throughout
Gas Cooking/Hot Water
1 Garage with Work Shop (Remote Lock Up with drive through)
580m2 Corner Block 18m Depth (Potential 2/3 Unit site) STCA
About the Location
-In Clayton South's Hottest Pocket, central and walking distance to Clayton Central (Restaurants/Groceries and other speciality stores)
-Easy Access to Bus and Train Services
-Located close to Namitjira Park (great for the kids or a run/stroll)
-Minutes' Drive to Costco, DFO, Chadstone Shopping Centre
-One of the strongest prospects for further Capital Growth.

Description:
Renovated Beauty!
Positioned perfectly in a high demand, family oriented area of Clayton South, this unique residence is ideal for the growing household looking to upsize and improve their lifestyle. Tucked away in the Springvalley Estate, there is no doubt that this is one of a kind, comprising of:
- 4 bedrooms all with BIR, Master w/ full en-suite & WIR
- 2 bathrooms in total, both updated with good finishes
- Spacious formal lounge w/polished floorboards
- Modern hostess kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances
- Adjoining family & dining area with extra outdoor entry
- Ducted Heating throughout, freshly painted
- Large front & back yards, expansive driveway and more
With its own reserve just moments away, this red brick wonder offers both privacy and space. You will be delighted by the serenity being only moments away from Springvale Central, Clayton, Monash University, Westall Station, local primary & secondary schools and public transport. Get your foot in the door before it is too late!

Description:
2800m2, The Next Growth Pocket, Flexible Terms (8-14 Months)
(Address is 169-175 Elder St South Clarinda Vic 3169)
Any other agents who apparently have a "special buyer" ........I am willing to 50/50 Split the commission)
Throughout history, fortunes have been made on land and location which most people fail to recognise the potential and value that lies within. Why follow the crowd and pay top prices on location and land with small profit margin? When you can purchase and redevelop this site into a profitable Venture with the right Development, Vision and Perseverance.

-Child Care Centre (Early Learning)
-Age Care

Flexible Settlement Terms
2800m2 of Prime Real Estate with Strong Existing and Growing Infrastructures
Close to New Dingley Bypass
Location Proximity (5-15 Minutes)
Clarinda Shopping Centre (5-10 minutes' walk)
Moorabbin Costco (DFO)
Southland Shopping Centre
Chadstone Shopping Centre
Monash University/Hospital/Children Hospital

Existing Home is Stunning and offer Opulent and grand Living..........

Description:
MORE LIKE A HOUSE THAN A UNIT
More like a house than a unit, this street front classic home with a large front garden has been kept in beautiful condition throughout its life with some updates making it instantly appealing and comfortable.
Fronted by a picket fence and a classic rendered facade, the home is light filled and features polished hardwood floors throughout, an L-shaped lounge/dining room and a pristine kitchen with stainless steel oven and cook top.
There are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes plus an updated family bathroom, 1 toilets and the added comforts of a gas heater and split system air conditioner there's also a rear set garage with a sectioned storage area.
And with buses, Keeley Park and central Clayton's shops and train station just minutes away, a great location just seals the deal.

Description:
Enter The Market In Superb Style
The contemporary vision of this superbly designed home is immediately apparent throughout this stylish townhouse in which clever concepts and custom details are brilliantly combined. Beautiful natural light highlights a spacious open plan living/meals area complementing a stone-topped kitchen and sunny west facing courtyard. 2 good-sized bedrooms both with BIRs, deluxe bathroom, powder room, split system heating/AC and SLUG/storage with internal access add further allure to a smart entry into the property market from a first home buyer or investor perspective. Perfectly positioned for lifestyle convenience, a walk to Clayton station and shops, Monash Medical Centre and minutes to Monash University.

Description:
832m2 approx - Land of Opportunity
Attention all developers, home buyers and investors. Here is a rare opportunity to buy a neat and liveable home on a great block of land which will make for a fruitful investment. Live in the home as it is whilst you get creative and speak to your architect about the possibility of multiple townhouses or units on this 832m2 approx block (STCA). With a frontage of 15.7 meters and 53meter deep (approx) the land is rectangular with no easements and offers many options. The location is superb and in a pretty tree lined street surrounded by other quality homes. Shops, schools, local busses and Westall train station are all close by.
Kylie Sirianni : 0402 019 540

Description:
Fantastic location! Stylish and modern living
This is a unique opportunity for the investor or the first home buyer looking to break into this most sought after apartment life style living in the ideal location. Situated within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shopping Strip, and only minutes from Monash University, Monash Medical Centre.
This beautiful ground floor 2 bedroom plus study, 2 bathroom apartment features air conditioning and heating, down lights throughout, wall to ceiling tiled bathroom, modern kitchen with stainless steel oven, rangehood and cooktop, beautiful glass splashback, dishwasher, verandah, underground car parking plus storage and much, much more!
Inspect now as this property will not last long!

Description:
Prime Location, Blue Chip Investment!
Only 2 on a block, nestled in a high demand street is this front brick veneer 3 bedroom unit. Only walking distances to Westall Train Station and Westall Secondary College and minutes' drive to Monash Medical Centre, Medical Clinics, Clayton Train Station, Monash University, Clayton Shopping Centre and mouth-watering restaurants, bus stops and so much more, are right at hand.
Offering: Formal lounge room with space heater and A/C, 3 generous bedrooms with wardrobes, security shutters, all gas appliances, main bathroom with separate toilet, 1 car carport at rear, garden shed and low maintenance garden.
Currently tenanted $1,517/PCM
Don't miss out on this golden opportunity!
CONTACT THU LE 0421 903 814
Terms: 10% deposit
Balance: 30/60/90 days
Photo ID Required for all Inspections

Description:
Uncompromised apartment living with garden oasis
Street front appeal and a private courtyard enhance this light, spacious single level home. Updated with neutral decor, polished floorboards and secure on title car parking, the property represents great value for those seeking a first home or an affordable investment. With generous open plan living & dining, modern fully equipped kitchen including dishwasher, gas stove & meals area, 2 double robed bedrooms, central tiled bathroom, separate toilet & laundry facilities. Conveniently located walking distance from Westall Station and within easy access of local schools, parks, Monash Uni & Monash Medical Centre.
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
Premium Desirable Pocket, Superb Family Home or Investment
Located in one of the hottest pockets right now, this home has all the characteristics of a winning formula for buying a home or an investment!
A great location coupled with a home that is full of potential and charm. Today's comfortable living and tomorrows tempting potential will be at the forefront of buyers minds when they step into this charming home, sitting pretty on a generous corner allotment.
About the home:
-4 Bedrooms
-2 Bathrooms
-2 Under Cover Parking (Garage and Carport)
-530m2 Land (Big enough to build 2 X 20 plus squares homes if you decide to rebuild) STCA
-New Carpet and Lining in Kitchen area
-Private Yard area, great for the kids or entertaining friends
About the Location:
-In Clayton South's Hottest Pocket, central and walking distance to Clayton Central (Restaurants/Groceries and other specialty stores)
-Easy Access to Bus and Train Services
-Located close to Namitjira Park (great for the kids or a run/stroll)
-Minutes Drive to Costco, DFO, Chadstone Shopping Centre
-One of the strongest prospects for further Capital Growth
